parameters.name: id
parameters.remarks: One or more comma-separated CoinMarketCap cryptocurrency IDs. Example: "1,2"

parameters.name: slug
parameters.remarks: Alternatively pass a comma-separated list of cryptocurrency slugs. Example: "bitcoin,ethereum"

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.remarks: Alternatively pass one or more comma-separated cryptocurrency symbols. Example: "BTC,ETH". At least one "id" *or* "slug" *or* "symbol" is required for this request.

parameters.name: aux
parameters.remarks: Optionally specify a comma-separated list of supplemental data fields to return. Pass `urls,logo,description,tags,platform,date_added,notice,status` to include all auxiliary fields.
